title: Somehow Got a Dawnbringer Emote
body:
My friend found a Dawnbringer emote in her emote collection. She says it definitely wasn't there a week or two ago. I can't seem to find anything about this emote besides from the VS. event a few months ago. She can't even find it in her purchase history nor did she get a notification from a gift. It wasn't in a box either. 

She and I are wondering how she got that icon? Or how others could get it too. It's really pretty

replies.body: You probably unlocked the emote from the VS event you mentioned! Now that emotes are a system all of their own, they went back and gave everyone who had those temporary event emotes a permanent version of them ^_^!
Its from the event a while back, a lot of people never received it after buying/completing the mission so its been redistributed (from talking to others).
